The data that is being used:

Crimes in Different Areas
```{r table_byCol,eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)

CrimeCol=table(crime$crimecat,crime$Occurred.DayTime)%>%
         prop.table(margin = 2)%>%   # 2 is % by column
         "*"(100)%>%
         round(3)
CrimeCol
```
